<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Force Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=320)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 587 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The edges of this elaborately engraved [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 8, HP 32, BT 16) bear tiny glass tiles set in mosaic patterns. 

<document level="2" id="action-192" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Force Shield
